name: Game Feel week 4 (3026284)
description:
Controls:
Left mouse button to interact with the menus. 
A D or  ← → keys to move. Spacebar to jump.

Added changes to the menu:
1. Plays a sound when you change the audio sliders.
2. In-game pause (without stopping music and sound effects).
3. Intro sound effects when starting the game.
Added changes to the game:
1. More intuitive level design.
         - Added animated arrows for leap of faiths.
         - Changed the scaling/positions of many deathblocks 
           that were previously considered unfair.


Music and sounds used from Opengameart.org:
Maou - Sci-fi Theme
David McKee - UI SFX Pack 2 Sample
ViRiX - UI and Item sound effect Jingles Sample 2
ViRiX - UI and Item sounds Sample 1
leohpaz - 10 Retro RPG Menu Sounds
